name: client
description: To run this application: Ensure most up-to-date version of node is installed on your machine. Copy/clone "client" folder onto your machine. Delete "package-lock.json" if present in "client". Open windows terminal and navigate to the "client" directory. Run "npm install" (this will install the required node modules). Once complete, run "npm start". Application should automatically load in your default browser (Chrome recommended).
author: Sam Turner
